Uses of Package
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui

Packages that use it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui
Package Description
it.polimi.ingsw.client  
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui  
  • Classes in it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui used by it.polimi.ingsw.client
    Class Description
    GUI
    The Gui class Extends Application Implements UI There are some static function used in Gui Controllers to avoid code duplicate
  • Classes in it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui used by it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui
    Class Description
    BaseController
    Controller of the generic base scene, show a the Player Board with all the info updates about the player
    ControllerGuiInterface
    Controller Gui interface Abstract class, each JavaFx controller inherits from this class in order to be managed by GUI class Each class that inherits must have an unique static attribute className of type String *
    GUI
    The Gui class Extends Application Implements UI There are some static function used in Gui Controllers to avoid code duplicate
    IntermediateController
    Generic controller for a Pane with the player's depots on the left and a set of choiceBox for the resources on the right When overiding update methods ensure to call super in order to guarantee Good updating of default elements of the pane
